statements: SELECT * FROM security_policies
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM security_policies WHERE access_control = 'ALLOW'
SELECT policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1
SELECT * FROM security_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC
SELECT policy_name, access_control FROM security_policies WHERE access_control = 'DENY'
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies ORDER BY policy_name ASC
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE access_control = 'ALLOW'
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, access_control FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id > 100 ORDER BY policy_id DESC
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%security%'
SELECT policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM network_infrastructure;
SELECT site_name, security_level FROM network_infrastructure WHERE security_level = 'High';
SELECT id, site_name FROM network_infrastructure ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT log_id, date_time, action_taken FROM access_logs ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_infrastructure WHERE security_level = 'High';
SELECT site_name, access_control FROM network_infrastructure WHERE access_control = TRUE;
SELECT site_name, security_level, access_control FROM network_infrastructure ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, date_time, action_taken FROM access_logs WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM access_logs WHERE action_taken LIKE '%login%';
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'access';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_id = 'e559f779-9a17-4d41-9412-1b3e9c559daa';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_type, policy_action FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'security' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE control_type = 'role-based' LIMIT 5;
SELECT control_name, control_description FROM access_controls WHERE control_type = 'attribute-based';
SELECT * FROM policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_type='security';
SELECT DISTINCT control_type FROM access_controls ORDER BY control_name ASC;
SELECT infrastructure_id, infrastructure_name, infrastructure_location FROM network_infrastructure WHERE infrastructure_type='core_network';
SELECT policy_name, policy_action FROM policies WHERE policy_type='access' AND policy_action='grant' ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_enforcement;
SELECT policy_name, description FROM policy_enforcement WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_infrastructure ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT control_name, control_type, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM 5g_users WHERE access_control_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM policy_enforcement ORDER BY id DESC, policy_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT control_name, control_type, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY control_name;
SELECT user_name, user_role, access_control_id FROM 5g_users WHERE user_role = 'Admin' OR user_role = 'Supervisor' ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM network_infrastructure WHERE location = 'HQ' ORDER BY device_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT policy_name, description FROM policy_enforcement WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, vendor FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY firmware_version DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, vendor FROM network_devices WHERE vendor = 'Cisco' AND device_type = 'Switch';
SELECT device_name, serial_number FROM network_devices WHERE serial_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT device_name, vendor FROM network_devices WHERE firmware_version = 'v1.2';
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_control WHERE granted_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High' AND description LIKE '%exploit%';
